mapper.select: SELECT ces.csat_seq,ces.exam_seq,ces.section_seq,ces.subject_seq, ces.subject_name, ces.max_score FROM csat_exam_subject ces WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM csat_qst WHERE csat_seq = ces.csat_seq AND exam_seq = ces.exam_seq AND section_seq = ces.section_seq AND subject_seq = ces.subject_seq) AND ces.csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND ces.exam_seq = #{examSequence} ORDER BY ces.section_seq ASC,ces.subject_seq ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO csat_exam_subject(csat_seq, exam_seq, section_seq, subject_seq, subject_name, max_score, exam_time) VALUES (#{csatSequence}, #{examSequence}, #{sectionSequence}, #{subjectSequence}, #{subjectName}, #{maxScore}, #{examTime})
